basic.description:
Review of the major groups of invertebrate fossils, emphasizing functional morphology, paleoecology, evolution, and geological significance.
NOTE    Course includes a required paleontological field trip. Please contact the Department for more information.
LEARNING HOURS    129 (36L;24Lb;6Pc;9Oc;54P)
basic.subject: GEOL
basic.title: Paleontology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite   GEOL238 or BIOL202 or permission of the Department.
